name: 品牌管理
description: The objective of this course aims at delivering fundamental concepts and real world cases in brand management. Essential concepts in branding and brand management, such as equity and positioning, will be emphasized. Taking the brand equity as the core concept, the course contents evolves around brand equity and discuss how equity is built, measured, and managed.
goals: Understand brand management planning and execution procedures
Understand the importance of brand management to a business
Procedures for International Brand Management Planning
Train teamwork ability to complete brand management planning
syllabus:
1\. Introduction to Brand Management   
2\. Customer-Based Brand Equity   
3\. Brand Positioning   
4\. Choosing Brand Elements to Build Brand Equity   
5\. Designing Marketing Programs to Build Brand Equity   
6\. Integrating Marketing Communications to Build Brand Equity   
7\. Leveraging Secondary Brand Associations to Build Brand Equity   
8\. Developing a Brand Equity Measurement and Management System   
9\. Measuring Sources of Brand Equity: Capturing Customer Mindset   
10\. Measuring Outcomes of Brand Equity: Capturing Market Performance   
11\. Designing and Implementing Branding Strategies   
12\. Introducing and Naming New Products and Brand Extensions   
13\. Managing Brands over Time   
14\. HBS Case 1   
15\. HBS Case 2   
16\. HBS Case 3   
17\. HBS Case 4   
18\. HBS Case 5   
19\. Final Project
